content.gatha1: ‘‘Tassa sutvā sataṃ dammi, sahassaṃ diṭṭha daṭṭhu (sī. pī.) soṇakaṃ;
content.gatha2: Mayhaṃ sutvā sataṃ dehi, sahassaṃ diṭṭha daṭṭhu (sī. pī.) soṇakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ahaṃ te soṇakakkhissaṃahaṃ soṇakamakkhissaṃahaṃ soṇakamakkhissaṃahaṃ te soṇakamakkhissaṃ , sahāyaṃ paṃsukīḷitaṃ’’.
Kattha soṇakamaddakkhikattha te soṇako diṭṭhokattha te soṇako diṭṭho , taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito’’.
Kārāpetvā samaṃ maggaṃ, agamā yena soṇako.
‘Na rāja kapaṇo hoti, dhammaṃ kāyena phassayaṃphusayaṃ .
content.gatha1: ‘Yo ca yodha (sī. syā.) dhammaṃ niraṃkatvānirākatvā , adhammamanuvattati;
content.gathalast: Sa rāja kapaṇo hoti, pāpo pāpaparāyano’’’.
Kacci bhoto sukhasseyyāsukhā seyyāsukhaseyyo , idha pattassa soṇaka’’’.
content.gatha2: Na tesaṃ koṭṭhe openti, na kumbhiṃ na khaḷopiyaṃna kumbhe na kaḷopiyāna kumbhe na kaḷopiyā ;
content.gathalast: Anavajjapiṇḍo anavajjo piṇḍā (pī.) bhottabbo, na ca kocūparodhati.
Nibbuto piṇḍo bhottabbo, na ca kocūparodhati.
Muttassa raṭṭhe carato, saṅgo yassa na vijjati.
content.gatha2: Corehi rakkhitaṃ maggaṃ, ye caññe paripanthikā;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ pakkamati, anapekkhova gacchati’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘bahūni samaṇabhadrāniBahūpi bhadrābahūpi bhadrakā ete etesaṃ, yo tvaṃ bhikkhu pasaṃsasi;
content.gathalast: Ahañca giddho kāmesu, kathaṃ kāhāmi soṇaka.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Piyā me mānusā kāmā, atho dibyāpi me piyā;
content.gathalast: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, ubho loke labhāmase’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kāme giddhākāmesu giddhākāmesu giddhā kāmaratā, kāmesu adhimucchitā;
content.gathalast: Tattha rattiṃ tattha divā, tattheva nirato mano.
Na pacchato na purato, nuttaraṃ nopi dakkhiṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dīpaṃ so najjhagāgañchina ajjhagañchina ajjhagacchi , agatī yattha pakkhinaṃ;
content.gathalast: So ca tattheva pāpattha, yathā dubbalako tathā.
Giddhā ce na vamissanti, kākapaññāvakākapaññāyakākapaññāyakākapaññāya te vidū.
Tvañca paññāyase tena, yadi kāhasi vā na vā.
Tatuttariṃ na bhāseyya, dāsovayyassadāso ayyassadāso ayirassa santike’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ko nume rājakattāro, suddā veyyattamāgatāsūtā veyyattimāgatāsūtā veyyattimāgatāsūtā veyyattimāgatā ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ rajje abhisiñcassu, so no rājā bhavissati’’.
Taṃ rajje abhisiñcissaṃ, so vo rājā bhavissati’’.
Taṃ disvā ālapī rājā, ekaputtaṃ manoramaṃ.
Te putta paṭipajjassu, rajjaṃ niyyādayāmi te.
Te putta paṭipajjassu, rajjaṃ niyyādayāmi te.
Te putta paṭipajjassu, rajjaṃ niyyādayāmi te.
Te putta paṭipajjassu, rajjaṃ niyyādayāmi te.
Tā putta paṭipajjassu, rajjaṃ niyyādayāmi te.
Tā putta paṭipajjassu, rajjaṃ niyyādayāmi te.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Daharasseva me tāta, mātā matāti me sutaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tayā vinā ahaṃ tāta, jīvitumpi na ussahe.
Subharo te bhavissāmi, na te hessāmi dubbharo’’.
Vohāro tattha gaṇheyya, vāṇijā byasanībyasanaṃ siyā.
Tā naṃ tattha ramessantiramissantiramissanti , tāhi cesomeso ramissati.
Taṃ disvā avacuṃ kaññā, dīghāvuṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhanaṃ.
Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Namhi devo na gandhabbo, nāpinamhi sakko purindado;
content.gathalast: Mamaṃmama bharatha bhaddaṃ vo bhaddante (ka.), ahaṃ bhattā bhavāmi vo’’.
‘Kuhiṃ rājā anuppatto, ito rājā kuhiṃ gato’’’.
Vāḷabījanivā ḷavījanīvā ḷavījanī muṇhīsaṃ, khaggaṃ chattañcupāhanaṃ;
Aticiṇṇo mayā dhammo, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito.
Tassa ce vacanaṃ kayirā, nāssa maggeyya kaṇṭako.
Tassa ce vacanaṃ kayirā, na so gaccheyya duggatiṃ.
Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggatiṃ.
Yaṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchanti, niraye te suṇohi me.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sañjīvo kāḷasutto ca, saṅghātosaṅkhāṭosaṅkhāṭo dve ca roruvā;
content.gathalast: Samantā yojanasataṃ, phuṭā pharitvā (a. ni. 3.36; pe. va. 71) tiṭṭhanti sabbadā.
Yaṃ yañhi dvāraṃ gacchanti, taṃ tadeva pithiyyatipidhīyarepithiyyarepithīyare .
Bāhā paggayha kandanti, patvā dukkhaṃ anappakaṃ.
Tālova mūlato samūlo (ka.) chinno, sa rājā vibhavaṅgato.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, yo naro pekkhate muniṃ;
‘‘Yo ca rājā adhammaṭṭho, raṭṭhaviddhaṃsano mago cuto (sī.);
content.gathalast: Tejobhakkhassa gattāni, lomehi calomaggehi calomaggehi calomaggehi ca nakhehi ca.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo lobhā pitaraṃ hanti, dosā vā purisādhamo;
‘‘Sa tādiso paccati lohakumbhiyaṃ, pakkañca sattīhi hananti nittacaṃ;
content.gathalast: Andhaṃ karitvā muttakarīsabhakkhaṃ, khāre nimujjanti tathāvidhaṃ naraṃ.
Vikkhambhamādāya vibandhavibaddhavibhajjavibhajja rajjubhi, vivaṭe mukhe sampavisantisaṃcavantisaṃcavantisaṃcavanti rakkhasā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sāmā ca soṇā sabalā ca gijjhā, kākoḷasaṅghā ca dijā ayomukhā;
content.gathalast: Saṅgamma khādanti vipphandamānaṃ, jivhaṃ vibhajja vighāsaṃ salohitaṃ.
content.gatha2: Ratī hi nesaṃ dukhino panītare, etādisasmiṃ niraye vasanti;
content.gatha1: ‘‘Putto ca mātaraṃ hantvā, ito gantvā yamakkhayaṃ;
‘‘Tamassavaṃtaṃ passavaṃtaṃ passavaṃtaṃ passutaṃ sakā gattā, ruhiraṃrudhiraṃrudhiraṃ attasambhavaṃ;
‘‘So ca taṃ nirayaṃ patto, nimuggo sataporisaṃ;
content.gathalast: Nāriyo ca aticārāaticāriniyoaticāriniyoaticāriniyo , narā ca paradāragū.
Sayanti vinividdhaṅgā, dīghaṃ jagganti sabbadā saṃvariṃ (sī. pī.).
content.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃ divā ca ratto ca, dussīlā mohapārutā;
content.gathalast: Sassuṃ vā sasuraṃ vāpi, jeṭṭhaṃ vāpi nanandaraṃnanandanaṃnanandanaṃ .
content.gatha2: Sa byāmamattaṃ kiminaṃ, jivhaṃ passati attaniattanoattano ;
content.gathalast: Viññāpetuṃ na sakkoti, tāpane pecca paccati.
Tato vantaṃ durattānaṃ, paresaṃ bhuñjarebhuñjatebhuñjatebhuñjate sadā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye migena migaṃ hanti, pakkhiṃ vā pana pakkhinā;
content.gathalast: Asanto rajasā channā, gantāgatā te nirayussadaṃ nirayaṃ adho (pī.).
content.gatha1: ‘‘Santo ca santova (syā.) uddhaṃ gacchanti, suciṇṇenidha kammunā;
content.gathalast: Suciṇṇassa phalaṃ passa, saindāsahindā devā sabrahmakā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ taṃ brūmi mahārāja, dhammaṃ raṭṭhapatī cara;
content.gathalast: Tathātathā tathātathā tathātathā tathā rāja carāhi dhammaṃ, yathā taṃ suciṇṇaṃ nānutappeyya pacchā’’ti.
